titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3442) to provide further means of accountability of the United States debt and promote fiscal responsibility, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3293) to provide for greater accountability in Federal funding for scientific research, to promote the progress of science in the United States that serves that national interest.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3442) to provide further means of accountability of the United States debt and promote fiscal responsibility, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3293) to provide for greater accountability in Federal funding for scientific research, to promote the progress of science in the United States that serves that national interest.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-420, by Mr. Sessions.
Resolution provides for consideration of H.R. 3442 and H.R. 3293.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 89.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 609.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 180 (Roll no. 65).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 178 (Roll no. 66).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3442) to provide further means of accountability of the United States debt and promote fiscal responsibility, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3293) to provide for greater accountability in Federal funding for scientific research, to promote the progress of science in the United States that serves that national interest.
